title: Vegetable-topped bread

ingredients.content: 50 g extra virgin olive oil, plus a little extra for greasing the baking tray
100 g red pepper, cut into pieces
100 g green pepper, cut into pieces
100 g courgette, unpeeled and cut into pieces

preparations.content: Pre-heat oven to 200°C and grease a baking tray.
Place extra virgin olive oil, water and lard into mixing bowl and mix <b>1 min/37°C/speed 2<b>.
Add yeast, flour, salt and sugar and mix <b>30 sec/speed 6<b>.
Transfer dough to the greased baking tray and roll very thinly using a rolling pin or hands.

hintsAndTricks: <b>Vegetarian version:<b> replace lard with olive oil when making the dough.
